backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and inquiries with access control, updates, sorting, and status tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report indicating AdSense script inclusion in the global HTML head.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summaries of multiple frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color system, dark mode, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React SPA and global Google AdSense script.
frontend/public/google388a124de0fa03e3.h: Google site verification HTML file for domain ownership validation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry configuring routes, QueryClientProvider, layout, and global UI providers.
frontend/src/components/site/AgentApplic: Form component handling LIC agent application submission with validation and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/site/FloatingCon: Floating call and WhatsApp action buttons using dynamic contact links.
frontend/src/components/site/InquiryForm: Reusable inquiry submission form with validation, backend integration, and status messaging.
frontend/src/components/site/MobileNumbe: Modal component that collects and validates an Indian mobile number before confirming or cancelling.
Context provider that intercepts clicks to show a mobile-number prompt and triggers actions after WhatsApp confirmation.
Footer displaying contact info, quick links, and attribution with dynamic year and phone link.
Header with branding, navigation links, and social/WhatsApp contact icons, including admin link logic.
frontend/src/components/site/VillupuramM: Component embedding a Google Maps iframe showing Villupuram location.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing related queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating inquiries and agent applications through the actor API with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAgentApplica: Defines a mutation hook to submit a new agent application and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit a customer inquiry and refresh inquiry data.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and custom LIC-themed color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/contactLinks.ts: Generates phone and WhatsApp contact links, including prefilled inquiry messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutLicPage.tsx: Renders an informational page about LIC with sections on offerings, history, and trust.
frontend/src/pages/AdminApplicationsPage: Admin interface for viewing, sorting, updating, and deleting agent applications.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Displays admin dashboard with navigation to manage inquiries and agent applications, with access control.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInquiriesPage.ts: Admin page that lists inquiries with sorting, status updates via dialog, and delete actions using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page showing personal details, call/WhatsApp links, and an inquiry form with a location map embed.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero CTA, introduction, and sections highlighting LIC benefits and services.
frontend/src/pages/JoinAsAgentPage.tsx: Page promoting LIC agent careers, outlining benefits and providing an application form.
frontend/src/pages/PolicyDetailsPage.tsx: Policy details page presenting LIC policy categories, benefits, and CTAs to call for guidance.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with a styled header and a grid of LIC service cards using Tailwind and Lucide icons.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL/hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state and requirements, detailing planned updates for the LIC site including recruitment features and UI changes.
